title: I Will Divorce the Female Lead’s Siscon Brother - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Divorce   Empires   European Ambience   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Late Romance   Male Yandere   Nobles   Possession   Possessive Characters   Royalty   Sister Complex
author: 오앤
description:
Edel possesses her favorite novel and marries Liena's older brother.

I thought we would naturally become a family, but that's just my imagination.

I asked for a divorce because I was tired of my cold husband, who only cared about his younger sister, and couldn't be separated from her.

'Divorce? Absolutely not. Wasn't it good when we were in a relationship?'

'Sister-in-law, think about it again!'

Unlike in the past, I am determined now.

'Then, can I get the mine back, which is my dowry?'

“Wait a minute, sister-in-law.”

There's no need to think about it again.

But my husband comes from a powerful duke family.

I need the help of the villain from the original story.

'Who on earth gave you a hard time?'

Isn't this man too precious to be hurt by Liena......?

“The only person I want to have by my side is you, Edel.”

......by your side?>
